title: Carbon Capture Climate Analysis
description: Interactive data visualization exploring carbon capture technologies and their potential to help Asia reach climate goals. Features comprehensive analysis of regional implementation challenges and opportunities.

title: Myanmar Copy Songs
description: Data-driven storytelling project exploring Myanmar's music industry through the lens of copy songs. Features interactive visualizations and cultural analysis of musical trends and copyright issues.

title: EcoSolve Dashboard
description: Environmental monitoring and sustainability tracking dashboard designed to help organizations visualize and manage their ecological impact through real-time data analytics.

title: USAID Trump Southeast Asia Crisis Analysis
description: Comprehensive data analysis examining the impact of Trump administration policies on USAID programs in Southeast Asia, featuring interactive visualizations of funding changes and regional effects.

title: Community GIS Tool (CGIST)
description: A collaborative GIS portal enabling local government officials to upload, clean, share, and analyze cross-departmental datasets. Features data editor and visualizer with permission settings and audit trails.
